subtitle: Hello, I'm Maude Braunstein
body: I'm a software developer based in Montreal with an interest in web development, clean code, and improving my life through technology. My passions include cats, coffee, code, and near-perfect alliteration.
body2: With a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Concordia University and over 5 years of experience, I'm currently exploring new opportunities to contribute my skills to exciting projects and work with talented teams. If interested, feel free to reach out!
